snippet: The Atlanta Symphony’s music director and principal guest conductor urge management to acknowledge the players’ concessions.
abstract: Atlanta Symphony Orchestra leader Robert Spano and principal guest conductor Donald Runnicles, as players and management are embroiled in tense labor negotiations, make plea to board and management that they acknowledge musicians' many sacrifices and find ways other than pay cuts to help decrease orchestra's deficits.
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Symphony’s music director and principal guest conductor urge management to acknowledge the players’ concessions.

headline.seo: Robert Spano Writes to Board of Atlanta Symphony
headline.main: Atlanta Orchestra Leaders Make a Plea for Musicians During Labor Talks
headline.print_headline: Atlanta Orchestra Leaders Make Plea in Labor Talks
